verses.text: NA‘A ku tautapa kia Sihova ‘i he‘eku faingata‘a‘ia Pea na‘a ne tali kita.
Fakahaofi ‘eku mo‘ui mei he ngutu loi, ‘e Sihova Mei he ‘elelo kākā.
Ko e hā te ne ‘atu kiate koe, ‘a e ‘elelo kākā? Pea ne ua ‘aki ‘a e hā?
Koni ngahau māsila ‘a e to‘a, Mo e malala sūnipa.
‘Oiauē kita ‘ete ‘āunofo ki Mēseke ena, ‘a e tu‘u hoto nofo‘anga mo e ‘ū tēniti ‘o Keta!
Ko hoku laumālie kuo fuoloa fau ‘ene nofo Mo ia ‘oku fehi‘a ki he melino.
‘Oku ou tangi melino au: Ka ‘oka u ka kamata lea, pea loto ‘e kinautolu ke tau.
